div.p: There is scientific evidence to support the notion
that cognitive ability diminishes with age.
However, adult learners need not worry that they have somehow lost the ability to learn.
One of their best learning assets is their experience.
Often this life and professional experience can be associated
These associations can aid deeper and lasting learning.
Another concern of adult students is memory.
Again, research does indicate the ability to memorize declines with age.
Deep learning requires memorization, analysis and application.
Today, people have many tools to help them recall facts.
So the goal is not the rote memorization that is often forgotten
after the need for memorization is over.
Deep learning allows for connections to be made to real-life situations.
